name: Baingan Aloo(Spiced Eggplant Potato Indian Recipe)
description: Baingan Aloo is a  quick and easy eggplant recipe with potatoes and spices.  A vegan recipe that the whole family will love!

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat oil on medium heat for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat oil on medium heat for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mustard seeds and let them splutter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mustard seeds and let them splutter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the curry leaves and hing and give it a mix
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the curry leaves and hing and give it a mix

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the coriander seeds, cumin powder, ginger, garlic and chili and cook for 2 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the coriander seeds, cumin powder, ginger, garlic and chili and cook for 2 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes and turmeric and mix well to coat. Cook for 2-3 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes and turmeric and mix well to coat. Cook for 2-3 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the eggplants, tomato and salt and mix well to coat with all the spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the eggplants, tomato and salt and mix well to coat with all the spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occasionally. I like my eggplants well cooked so i cook the dish for a few minutes longer. My mom likes hers just about done and not very mashed, so she cooks on low heat and doesnt stir it much.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occasionally. I like my eggplants well cooked so i cook the dish for a few minutes longer. My mom likes hers just about done and not very mashed, so she cooks on low heat and doesnt stir it much.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with freshly chopped cilantro leaves, with Rotis or Naan and a side dish of Daal(lentil curry)
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with freshly chopped cilantro leaves, with Rotis or Naan and a side dish of Daal(lentil curry)

keywords: easy vegan recipe, eggplant curry, potato curry
